articles.title: Moon May Have Harboured Life 4 Billion Years Ago, Research Suggests - http://www.newsgram.com/
articles.description: While the Moon is presently unsuitable for habitation, there could have been life on its surface about four billion years ago, researchers have suggested.
articles.content:
